title: Kaiju Alert Command Center Adventure #33
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Main Control Room
rooms.description: A high-tech command center with wall-sized monitors displaying seismic activity and radar sweeps. Red emergency lights pulse rhythmically. Coffee cups and scattered reports cover workstations. Through the reinforced windows, you can see the distant silhouette of a massive creature approaching the city. Alarms blare warnings about an imminent kaiju breach.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A sophisticated computer terminal with multiple screens showing kaiju tracking data

items.name: security protocol memo
items.description: An urgent memo about evacuation procedures
items.text: SECURITY MEMO: All personnel must evacuate via the emergency bay. Research keycard stored in console drawer B. Combination is the year of the first kaiju attack: 2054. Remember your training!

items.name: research lab keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'RESEARCH LAB ACCESS - LEVEL 3'

items.name: operations desk
items.description: A cluttered desk covered with incident reports and kaiju classification files

items.name: kaiju incident report
items.description: A detailed report about recent kaiju activity
items.text: INCIDENT REPORT K-033: Kaiju designation TITAN-7 detected approaching from the Pacific Trench. Lead researcher Doctor Chen has classified it as Category 5. Chief of Operations Commander Hayes has ordered full evacuation. All data must be secured in the research vault.

items.name: monitoring displays
items.description: Large screens showing real-time kaiju tracking and city evacuation status
items.text: ALERT: TITAN-7 ETA 15 minutes. Evacuation status: 73% complete. Research lab contains critical data on kaiju weakness. Secure all classified materials before evacuation.

items.name: reinforced security door
items.description: A heavy steel door with a card reader leading to the research wing

rooms.name: Kaiju Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A sterile laboratory filled with scientific equipment and holographic displays showing 3D models of various kaiju. Specimen containers line the walls, and a large research vault dominates the far side of the room. Papers and data tablets are scattered everywhere, evidence of a hasty evacuation. The floor trembles periodically as the approaching kaiju draws closer.

items.name: research computer terminal
items.description: A high-security terminal with classified kaiju research data
items.text: CLASSIFIED RESEARCH DATABASE: TITAN-7 weakness identified - electromagnetic pulse at frequency 432 Hz. Data backed up in vault. Access code required for evacuation authorization.

items.name: specimen storage cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet containing kaiju tissue samples and research materials

items.name: research vault key
items.description: A biometric key for accessing the secure research vault

items.name: kaiju tissue sample
items.description: A sealed container with a glowing blue tissue sample from a previous kaiju encounter

items.name: Doctor Chen desk
items.description: The lead researcher's desk with personal notes and research journals

items.name: Doctor Chen research journal
items.description: A personal journal with handwritten notes about kaiju behavior
items.text: Research Journal - Doctor Chen: TITAN-7 is unlike anything we've seen. Its weakness frequency is 432 Hz. Commander Hayes must authorize the evacuation. Only those who know the lead researcher, the operations chief, and the kaiju's designation can access the emergency bay.

items.name: secure research vault
items.description: A reinforced vault containing critical kaiju research data and evacuation protocols

items.name: emergency evacuation protocol
items.description: Official evacuation procedures and authorization codes
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: All personnel must proceed to the emergency bay. Bay access requires security verification. The electromagnetic pulse weapon is stored in the bay for final defense. Authorization questions must be answered correctly.

items.name: classified data drive
items.description: A portable drive containing all research data on TITAN-7's weaknesses

items.name: kaiju hologram projector
items.description: A 3D holographic display showing TITAN-7's approach trajectory
items.text: HOLOGRAPHIC ANALYSIS: TITAN-7 approaching from Pacific Trench. Category 5 threat level. Estimated height: 400 feet. Current designation: TITAN-7. Weakness: EM pulse at 432 Hz.

items.name: evacuation bay blast door
items.description: A massive reinforced door leading to the emergency evacuation bay. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead kaiju researcher?
password_questions.hint: Check the incident report and research journal

password_questions.question: Who is the chief of operations?
password_questions.hint: The incident report mentions the person who ordered evacuation

password_questions.question: What is the kaiju designation?
password_questions.hint: Look at the incident report and holographic display

rooms.name: Emergency Evacuation Bay
rooms.description: You've made it to the evacuation bay! A sleek emergency transport vehicle sits ready on the launch pad, its engines humming. Through the massive bay doors, you can see the city skyline and the towering form of TITAN-7 in the distance. The electromagnetic pulse weapon is mounted and ready. A control panel shows the evacuation route is clear. It's time to escape!

items.name: emergency transport
items.description: A high-speed evacuation vehicle designed to outrun kaiju threats

items.name: electromagnetic pulse cannon
items.description: A powerful weapon calibrated to TITAN-7's weakness frequency

items.name: launch control panel
items.description: The final control panel showing all systems green for evacuation
items.text: LAUNCH CONTROL: All systems operational. Evacuation route clear. EMP weapon armed and ready. You have successfully secured the research data and can now evacuate safely. Good luck!

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You board the emergency transport with the critical kaiju research data. As you launch away from the command center, you activate the EMP weapon, buying the city precious time. TITAN-7 staggers as the electromagnetic pulse hits its weakness point. You've completed your mission and escaped with vital information that will help humanity defend against future kaiju attacks. The command center may be lost, but the knowledge you saved will protect countless lives. You win!
